name: Hotelier of the Heat
description:
The Elements have hit, there is a blizzard raging and the hotels heating is not going to last, as the hotels handyman you will need to repair the Elements in the heaters to maintain the hotels temperature and stop the tenants from freezing!

This game was made in 5 days for the LM0B Beginner Game Jam #27.

Made by: 

Aaron Cooper - Program Lead

Andrew Hicken - UI / UX Design 

Rachel Stiller - Environment Design

Jordan Thornton - Project Lead
